meanings.definition: The side posts of a doorway or window frame.
meanings.sent1: She leaned against the jambs of the open window.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully measured the jambs before installing the new door.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat tried to squeeze through the narrow gap between the jambs.
meanings.sent4: The vines grew around the jambs, creating a natural frame for the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streamed through the jambs, casting long shadows on the floor.

meanings.definition: A vertical surface forming the side of an opening, as in a fireplace.
meanings.sent1: The fire crackled warmly between the jambs of the fireplace.
meanings.sent2: He placed the candle on the jamb next to the cozy hearth.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten got stuck behind the jamb while exploring the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: The old stone jambs held memories of countless fires lit in the hearth.
meanings.sent5: The flickering flames danced along the jambs, creating a mesmerizing display.
